attributes.action: Give people the legal right to be agendered (genderless).
attributes.additional_details:
On the 26/03/2017 the Multnomah County Court in Oregon, USA, gave Patch the legal right to be genderless. Let's do the same here in the UK.
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/judge-gender-genderless-legal-patch-us-landmark-ruling-a7651036.html

Statistics:
https://practicalandrogyny.com/2014/12/16/how-many-people-in-the-uk-are-nonbinary/

Information:
http://gender.wikia.com/wiki/Agender
attributes.background: At least 0.4% of British people (approx. 1 in 250) are non-binary gendered. In all official documentation, people like us are typically forced to choose between "Male and Female", nor can we change our sex to "non-binary". Please give us the legal right to be non-binary gendered.
